keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $642.64 for services rendered to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Multiple shipments were made by Epstein, with various recipients including Marie Joseph Spertin and Louis and Nancy Bovin.
The invoice includes discounts applied to the shipping charges, amounting to $19.12 saved.
